meanings.definition: A type of ray fish found in Australian waters.
meanings.sent1: The stingaree gracefully glided through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a stingaree swimming near the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: The stingaree decided to play hide-and-seek with the other sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as smooth and silent as a stingaree in the water.
meanings.sent5: The stingaree's unique shape makes it easy to identify in the sea.

meanings.definition: To sting or hurt like a stingaree.
meanings.sent1: The bee's sting felt like a stingaree on my arm.
meanings.sent2: His harsh words seemed to stingaree her feelings.
meanings.sent3: The cold wind stingareed my cheeks as I walked outside.
meanings.sent4: The betrayal from a friend can stingaree more than any physical pain.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his words continued to stingaree her long after he had left.

meanings.definition: A person who is cunning or deceitful.
meanings.sent1: The stingaree tricked the other animals with its clever tactics.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the stingaree of the office for her sneaky behavior.
meanings.sent3: The stingaree always had a mischievous twinkle in his eye.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the stingaree in sheep's clothing, they may deceive you.
meanings.sent5: His reputation as a stingaree made others cautious of trusting him.
